post.description:
Receives a question and option id. Matches these values to the current existing unfinished quiz.

Updates the quiz state with the outcome (correct/wrong). It returns:
- the correct option id + next question - if the quiz is not completed
- ... or the quiz completion response - if the quiz is completed

Based on the outcome, new rounds of questions are generated as follows:
- the probability of a question to appear is increasing as to how many times that question was wrongly answered in a row, OR it increases as to how many times it was prevented from appearing
- the probability of a question to appear is decreasing as to how many times that question was correctly answered in a row

To prevent cheating, option-ids and question-ids are generated each time questions are being generated from the words.

NOTE: this endpoint is accesible only if the user has this lesson block unlocked

epilogue.name: Anna's family
epilogue.textStoryTale:
"Семья Анны"
  
      Меня зовут Анна. Я живу вместе со своей семьей: мамой, папой и братом. Моя мама зовут Катя, а папа - Иван. Мой брат Александр младше меня на два года.
  
      Мы любим проводить время вместе. Часто мы гуляем в парке, играем в футбол и готовим вкусную еду. Я люблю готовить блины, а папа обычно готовит мясо на гриле. Брат Александр помогает мне смешивать тесто.
  
      Я учусь в школе и занимаюсь каждый день. Мне нравится учиться русскому языку. Я говорю "я", когда говорю о себе, и "ты", когда обращаюсь к брату или другу. Моя мама и папа говорят "они" о других людях.
  
      Когда я возвращаюсь домой после школы, я обычно делаю уроки и помогаю маме приготовить ужин. Потом мы все вместе садимся за стол и едим вкусную еду, говоря о нашем дне. Я люблю мою семью и всегда рада проводить время вместе с ними.

Get the specified user story for the current user.
Each user story contains information from the lesson story associated and the progress of the user.

tags.name: Lesson languages
tags.description: Get list of languages supported by the lessons.

tags.name: User Stories
tags.description: Get user progress of a story. A story is a lesson chapter containing learning blocks: multiple building blocks and a final epilogue block.

tags.name: Building blocks
tags.description: Get user progress around a building block of a story chapter - the initiating sub-chapter of a story. A building block is a lesson block which consists of a set of words based around one onthology (Ex. pronons, family, etc.)

tags.name: Epilogue blocks
tags.description: Get user progress around an epilogue block of a story chapter - the final sub-chapter of a story. An epilogue block is a lesson block which consists of a text / short-story formed by words learnt during the completion of prior building blocks and the completion of previous lessons.

tags.name: Quiz - Builiding blocks
tags.description: Start / Continue quiz about a building block of a story chapter. It helps user learn the set of words associated with the building blocks by providing repeated questions with options to pick and answer. The quiz stops when all the questions are answered correctly consistently, indicating learning. When such quiz is finished, the dependent building blocks are unlocked or the epilogue of the lesson story is unlocked in case all the building blocks are completed.

tags.name: Quiz - Epilogue blocks
tags.description: Start / Continue quiz about an epilogue block of a story chapter. It tests user understanding of the text-story by providing repeated questions about what the short-story describes. The quiz stops when all the questions are answered consistently, indicating learning. When such quiz is finished, the user story is considered completed and the dependent locked stories are unlocked.
